original_text: When Leah saw that she had stopped having children, she took her servant Zilpah and gave her to Jacob as a wife.
korean_text: 레아가 자기의 출산이 멈춤을 보고 그의 시녀 실바를 데려다가 야곱에게 주어 아내로 삼게 하였더니

sentences.original_text: When Leah saw that she had stopped having children
sentences.korean_translation: 레아가 자기가 아이를 낳지 못하게 되었음을 보았을 때
그녀는 자기의 여종 실바를 데리고 와서

sentences.original_text: and gave her to Jacob as a wife
